title: Please allow transfer to Taiwan server
body:
Ive been in Australia for a few years time and now back in Taiwan 
please allow account transfer to Taiwan server 
Ive been waiting for ages
I dont wanna start all over again{{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

The taiwan server is currently operated by [Garena](https://lol.garena.tw/preindex), transfers were open temporarily quite a while back for a limited time and were then disabled, never to be seen again.

Transferring to and from Garena owned servers to Riot owned servers is a pain, everything must be done manually afaik. Your best bet would be to continue to play on OCE or transfer to another Riot owned region.

Sorry about that.
